text: Grey Dawn is a 2015 Ghanaian Nigerian drama movie directed by Shirley Frimpong-Manso and starring Bimbo Manuel, Funlola Aofiyebi-Raimi, Sika Osei, Marlon Mave. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 drama movies Category:Ghanaian movies Category:Nigerian movies Category:Movies directed by Shirley Frimpong- Manso
title: Grey Dawn (movie)
